text: Antonello Spadafora (born 13 June 1979 in Paola, Calabria) is an Italian painter of contemporary art.Encyclopedia of italian art, Antonello Spadafora, born 13 June 1979 in Paola. ==Bibliography== * Monograph, Sotto il cielo pulito, personal exhibition catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Roma, 2010. Personal exhibition, catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Sotto il cielo pulito, Roma, 2010. * Monograph, I volti di san Francesco, personal exhibition catalog of Antonello Spadafora, by P. Rocco Benvenuto, Michele Bassarelli, Pizzo Calabro, 2016.Personal exhibition, catalog of Antonello Spadafora, I volti di san Francesco, Pizzo Calabro, 2016. * Monograph, Mistery, personal exhibition catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Paola, Calabria, 2017.Personal exhibition, catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Mistery, Paola, 2017. * Monograph, Nella croce, personal exhibition catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Paola, Galleria C.so Garibaldi, Paola, Calabria, 2018.Personal exhibition, catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Nella croce, Paola, 2018. * Monograph, Clothing, personal exhibition catalog of Antonello Spadafora, by Marta Lock, Paola, Calabria, 2019.Personal exhibition, catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Clothing, by Marta Lock, Paola, Calabria, 2019. * Catalog of Modern Art No 54, in Giovanni Faccenda, "The Italian Artist from the early twentieth century to today"(Gli Artisti Italiani dal Primo Novecento ad Oggi), Giorgio Mondadori, Milan, 2019, pp. 88\. . * Monograph, Cotidianam, personal exhibition catalog of Antonello Spadafora, by Roberto Sottile, Marta Lock, Roma, 2020.Personal exhibition, catalog of Antonello Spadafora, Cotidianam, by Roberto Sottile, Marta Lock, Roma, 2020. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters == References == == Other websites == * Antonello Spadafora, biography on Artprice.com Category:1979 births Category:Italian painters Category:People from Calabria Category:Living people
title: Antonello Spadafora
